title: Bug 3666 - CodeCompletion Hungry code assist (1GDRYW5)
description: Under certain circumstances, the code assist feature eats too much code. The issue can be reproduced with the enclosed class. It is observed that a parameter needs to be added to the 'baz' call in 'bar' to make the program correct.
OB: Code assist is consuming too much code.
EB: The code should be changed to: baz(x.foo().foo()). Instead of baz(x.foo());
SR: To reproduce the issue: 1. Compile and run the attached class. 2. Add a parameter to the 'baz' call in 'bar'. 3. Verify if the program works correctly after the modification.
